<div class="page-layout-custom" style="height:88vh">
<iframe src="https://nemgen.itkservices2.com" title="rolling-5minute-opgeneration" height=100% width=100% ></iframe> 
</div>
  <script>
  (function() {
      var lastRefresh = Date.now();

      setInterval(function() {
          var now = new Date();
          if (now.getHours() === 0 && now.getMinutes() === 1) {
              if (Date.now() - lastRefresh > 300000) {
                  var iframe = document.querySelector('iframe');
                  if (iframe) {
                      iframe.src = iframe.src.split('?')[0] + '?t=' + Date.now();
                      lastRefresh = Date.now();
                      console.log('Dashboard refreshed at midnight');
                  }
              }
          }
      }, 60000);
  })();
  </script>
